document.full_text: a minister offering the opening prayer at the minnesota house on friday appeared to question president barack obama's belief in jesus in remarks before lawmakers could begin debating a same sex marriage ban.
document.title: minister slams obama in prayer opening minnesota house
lines_and_colors: a minister offering the opening prayer at the minnesota house on friday appeared to question president barack obama's belief in jesus in remarks before lawmakers could begin debating a same sex marriage ban.
